parameters.name: expiry
parameters.short_description: Sets an expiry date for the status.
parameters.long_description: Usage: --expiry=#(d|h|m|s), where # is the number of days, hours, minutes or seconds during which the status is valid, or --expiry=DD.MM for day and month.

parameters.name: help
parameters.short_description: Displays this help text. Use --help=(parameter name) to see a more detailed help about the parameter.
parameters.long_description: Nothing to see here, move along.

parameters.name: all
parameters.short_description: Shows all statuses regardless of settings.

parameters.name: no-expired
parameters.short_description: Filters out expired statuses regardless of settings.

parameters.name: show-expired
parameters.short_description: Persistent option to determine whether expired statuses are shown in the usual '/standup' usage.
